products.title: Choices Leyton Pale Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Keeping it simple is often the key to keeping it classy, but simple doesnt have to be the same as boring. This blushing beauty is an ideal alternative to more traditional neutrals, with its pastel pink shade thats soft and subtle, but bright and uplifting enough to transform keeping it simple is often the key to keeping it classy, but simple doesnt have to be the same as boring.

products.title: Leyton Pale Pink Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful leyton pale pink roman blind shows just how well pink tones can work in a simple, classy scheme. The shade is subtle and subdued, delicate almost, which is perfect for maintaining a neutral vibe. Pair with similarly subdued blue shades for a complementary look, this beautiful leyton pale pink roman blind shows just how well pink tones can work in a simple, classy scheme.
